name: Carol's Night
description: Carol’s night is a 3D puzzle game. The bullied girl Carol, who committed suicide, is rescued by a strange rabbit doll and is given the power to change the gravity direction to fight her way back. You can manipulate gravity by pressing different keys and eschew traps by going through portals if they are in the right place. Moreover, you need to find the hidden keys in order to open locked doors and get to the ultimate room to crack the boss girl’s power. There are also ubiquitous collections waiting for you, collect all of them to reach a happy ending.
